item.title: By: Kelly
item.dc:creator: Kelly
item.description: I do the same thing as Denys! Also the other day a colleague and friend complimented me on my writing for work and I acted like such a freak. instead of just saying thank you, I was like "yeah, well whenever we're making fun of how dull and dry the way we write here is, it doesn't seem like much to be proud of!" Yeah. So gracious.
item.content:encoded: I do the same thing as Denys! Also the other day a colleague and friend complimented me on my writing for work and I acted like such a freak. instead of just saying thank you, I was like “yeah, well whenever we’re making fun of how dull and dry the way we write here is, it doesn’t seem like much to be proud of!” Yeah. So gracious.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/stranger-danger/#comment-630">Suzi</a>.
I do that if I have the time to look at someone! If I'm totally taken by surprise though, word vomit.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

I do that if I have the time to look at someone! If I’m totally taken by surprise though, word vomit.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/stranger-danger/#comment-631">Denys</a>.
Haha! I do that sometimes, too! Just please don't stop telling me about when you get your cute things at Target.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Denys.

Haha! I do that sometimes, too! Just please don’t stop telling me about when you get your cute things at Target.

item.title: By: Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: When someone likes something I am wearing, I always tell them how cheap it was and that I bought it at Target. Just say "thanks" Denys!
item.content:encoded: When someone likes something I am wearing, I always tell them how cheap it was and that I bought it at Target. Just say “thanks” Denys!

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: You're not alone lady...accepting a compliment is not an easy thing to do. I like to counter with a compliment of my own before my brain has a chance to start listing all the reasons they shouldn't like what they see. Try it next time, it gets easier.
item.content:encoded: You’re not alone lady…accepting a compliment is not an easy thing to do. I like to counter with a compliment of my own before my brain has a chance to start listing all the reasons they shouldn’t like what they see. Try it next time, it gets easier.
